com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.ui.adapters

Class GroceryListAdapter.GroceryViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.ui.adapters.GroceryListAdapter.GroceryViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View.OnClickListener
    Enclosing class:
    GroceryListAdapter

    class GroceryListAdapter.GroceryViewHolder
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements View.OnClickListener
    A ViewHolder containing one grocery item to be displayed in the RecyclerView in MainActivity.
    See Also:
    MainActivity

      • onClick

        public void onClick(View v)
        Called when an item in the RecyclerView in MainActivity is clicked. Checks if the device screen is wide (>900 dp) and based on that launches GroceryItemDetailFragment either in MainActivity or GroceryItemDetailActivity.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - Default parameter from the parent method. The View that was clicked.
        See Also:
        MainActivity, GroceryItemDetailFragment, GroceryItemDetailActivity
